creator: kishorebabu.potla@onstar.com
text:
Hi,

When I tried to load Weblogic9.2 webservice WSDL in WSDL URL section of WebService(SOAP) Request,the wsdl is not loading and web methods are not populating in combo box and getting the below mentioned result. But when I load Axis1.4 version of web serice WSDL, which is deployed in the same server as Weblogic9.2 webservice deployed is loading and web methods are populating in combo box and i am able to proceed for test. I kept the mail.jar and activation.jar in /lib directory of Jmeter.

What could be the reason to not able to load Weblogic9.2 webservice WSDL.please help me out.

Sample Result
---------------------------------------------
Thread Name: TestThread Group 1-1
Sample Start: 1969-12-31 19:00:00 EST
Load time: 0
Latency: 0
Size in bytes: 0
Sample Count: 1
Error Count: 1
Response code: 000
Response message: [SOAPException: faultCode=Could not create document; msg=]

Response headers:

Not all WSDL formats are supported.

You'll have to populate the fields yourself. Sorry.
creator: sebb@apache.org
